questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and architecture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) An architectural detail

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A painting
B) A sculpture
C) A person
D) A landscape

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A lion's head sculpture
C) A fountain
D) A person

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A building
C) A brick Wall
D) A car

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A garden
B) A pathway
C) A sculpture
D) A painting

What type of material is the sculpture made from?
A) Metal
B) Wood
C) Stone/ Concrete
D) Glass

What is the sculpture depicting?
A) A human figure
B) An abstract form
C) An animal
D) A landscape

A) Elephant
B) Lion
C) Tiger
D) Bear

What is the texture of the sculpture?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Glossy
D) Transparent

C) Classical
D) Brick

A) Red

C) Grey
D) White

What is the color of the sculpture?

B) White
C) Grey
D) Brown

A) Circular
B) Square

D) Irregular

B) Angry

D) Sad

A) Curly
B) Straight

D) Spiky

D) Painted

A) Columns

D) Windows

What is the artistic style of the sculpture?
